title: Portfolio Item
description: A creative within a portfolio. Wraps a creative-manifest with portfolio-specific metadata like approval status and preview URLs.

creative_id.description: Unique identifier for this creative within the portfolio

manifest.description: The creative manifest containing format_id and assets. The rendered ad tag (with trackers embedded) is an asset within this manifest (e.g., html-asset or vast-asset).

advertiser_status.description: Advertiser/brand approval status. Distinct from any seller-side approval which happens after the seller receives the creative.

preview_url.description: URL to preview the rendered creative

thumbnail_url.description: URL to a static thumbnail image of the creative

updated_at.description: When this creative was last modified

seller_approvals.description: Approval status from seller agents for specific media buys. Updated via webhook notifications from sellers.
